item.title: 2 Boxes full of gas cannisters, 10th June
item.description:
Resident reporting 2 boxes could be part full or full of dangerous substances (gas containers) they are spilling all over the pavement & into the road. Possibly dumped during the night. Please could someone look into removing these urgently as they are dangerous because contain gas
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Riverdale Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on litter bin at Charlton Park Rd bus stop, 10th June
item.description:
Silver graffiti sprayed on top and at side of black RBG litter bin next to Charlton Park Rpad bus stop. Has been there a few weeks so should have been reported by operatives emptying the bin and reported as a crime, as well as removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mulberry Close, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is not working in front of 44a culmore rd, se15 2rq., 10th June
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned Lime Electric Bike opposite No 3, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: Fry tipping on public road, 10th June
item.description:
My neighbour keeps on fly tipping on a public road they have put a whole bed on that public road it started with a whole fridge freezer now this it is stopping my daughter being able to pick and drop her off by her cab she goes to special school and blocks the view of on coming traffic being able to get in and out of the drive this is a constant nightmare

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 592, Sidcup Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
